desc: Welcome investors! Here you will be able to make your selection of the rewards you earned by investing in our Offering. Use the coupon code you received in the mail to receive all your items free of charge.

layout.text: If you are an investor through our Regulation A+ offering, you have been sent a unique coupon that will allow you to add all items valued up to the amount of your earned Perk Rewards.

You will see the selection of Limited Edition investor items below, where you can make your selections and then add them to the Cart. Once you've finished selecting your items, proceed to the Checkout and add your coupon to receive all items for Free!
You'll get a coupon in your mail
Shop in High Times investors shop
Apply your coupon and get items for free!
